prompt_base: raw photo, close up portrait of a young woman, piercing cold blue eyes, short straight hair, natural skin texture, masterpiece, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, flawed skin, subtle freckles, individual hair strands, realistic fabric weave, soft natural sunlight, (photorealistic:1.3)
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic, doll, mannequin, cgi, 3d render, exaggerated eyes, makeup, smooth skin, airbrushed, low quality
